title: LFM Bronze Ranked 5s
body: Hey looking for some bronze players like myself for ranked 5s and duo queues, dont have to be amazing just willing to learn and co ordinate with team. I main adc but can play any role, my champion pool for adc consists of everyone but i dont really play draven, mf ashe or kogmaw i do play everyone else. You can reply here if you are keen or add me ign - ADG SHINOBI

replies.body:
Sounds good
IGN: Alien1521
Rank: B4 in promos atm
Lane: Usually fill, but enjoy mid, and jng
I'm actually a silver now but I'd be happy to play in your team. I main jungle but can support as well if needed (just can't cs!).

Sounds cool bro
add me
